name: Takwahiminana

location.name: Young Centre for the Performing Arts

description: ['TAK-wa-HI-mi-na-na' A Cree and Michif word for chokecherry] Takwahiminana is a darkly funny, deeply moving new play by award-winning playwright Matthew MacKenzie (First Métis Man of Odesa, Bears). Sharon—a Métis woman born in India, who moved back to her ancestral home in Alberta as a teenager, has always been caught between cultures.Now an adult, at a lavish foodie dinner party hosted by her longtime paramour, she’s marking the unofficial 20th anniversary of their extramarital affair.

name: Takwahiminana
keywords: world premiere, opening night, Bharatanatyam choreography

location.name: Young Centre for the Performing Arts
